Class MainMenu

java.lang.Object
  Menu
      MainMenu

public class MainMenu
extends Menu

The main menu of the store terminal This menu including following menu options:
Search elements in the store
Add a new item to store
Add a new gift to store
Sale item to customer
Redeem gift to customer
List all customers in store
List all items in store
List all gifts in store
Print out a store report including previous three
Quit the store terminal

Author:
Xu Waycell, Way Studios
See Also:
SearchMenu, CreateItemAction, CreateGiftAction, SaleItemAction, RedeemGiftAction, GenerateCustomerListAction, GenerateItemListAction, GenerateGiftListAction, GenerateStoreReportAction, Terminal.terminate()
